titles.title: Air Carrier Antitrust Enforcement Restoration Act of 1987

A bill to amend the Clayton Act to restore the jurisdiction of the Attorney General of the United States and of the Federal Trade Commission to enforce the provisions of the Clayton Act relating to the merge of carriers.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Monopolies and Commercial Law.

bill.summary: 3/31/1987--Introduced. Air Carrier Antitrust Enforcement Restoration Act of 1987 - Amends the Clayton Act to provide for the enforcement by the U.S. Attorney General and the Federal Trade Commission of provisions relating to the merger of air carriers.
